articles.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: BTC Slips Below $107.5K on Tariff Sell-Off Fears - CoinDesk
articles.description: Bitcoin faces selling pressure after Trump’s EU tariff warning, with price breaking key support and technicals signaling volatility near $107K.
articles.content:
Bitcoin's recent pullback has established strong volume-based resistance near $108,300, with support forming in the $106,700-$107,000 zone.
The correction accelerated with a notable price surge from… [+2023 chars]
